description:
Black☆Star and Tsubaki face Masamune, and as the battle against the dark Weapon escalates, it becomes clear that Tsubaki must finish the fight alone.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`épée maudite Masamune. Rupture de Possession de l`âme. Cœur chantant sous la pluie ?
Masamune, la Lama Incantata. La possessione di un`anima
The Enchanted Sword Masamune: Break the Soul Possession - A Heart Sings in the Rain?
Youtou Masamune - Yabure Hyoui Tamashii, Ame ni Utau Kokoro?
妖刀マサムネ ~破れ憑依[ひょうい]魂, 雨に詠[うた]う心?
